name: Xami in Nanoland
description:
Xami is washed up on a mysterious island. The only inhabitants are some friendly pink blobs who like your pants. There is also some very unfriendly black pointy guys. Round up as many blobs as you can and get rid of all the black stuff.

Game is still in development. This is the half way point hopefully. 

Plans are to add different blobs & mechanics based off the animal npcs.

have this partially working & will change blob type by pressing 1,2,3,4,5.

This might break the game

Music:
